timeline.bodyText: I don't think this can happen really... And if it does it's doubtful that AbstractMongoClientProducer.class.getClassLoader() will save you (certainly not dev mode that is :))
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: I copied this pattern from the Smallrye Fault Tolerance extension, and I just check almost all extensions directly used Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader() so it should be safe to use it.
replies.author: loicmathieu

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I can't see a scenario where Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader() will return null. In any case this is very minor so it's not worth putting too much thought into it
replies.author: geoand
